column5: This is so stupid, who are the idiots that decide what uniform teams representing our country wear?  Those kids are dressed in Black, since when is this a team Canada color. Even their white uniforms have so little red it's disgusting.  I was sure our country's colors were still red and white.  That's my rant for today.
They are terrible aren't they?Watching on a 19 inch makes them look even worse.
They had those black ones for a couple years havent they?

They have had them for several yrs now. The Russians are red, the Checz are red and blue so I think they look very cool wearing the black and red with the nifty red and white racing stripe down the sleeves. Who cares anyway as long as they play well and win. What goaltending a good start to the tourney. GO CANADA GO.

i personally like the black look!  I know its not traditional colours but remeber the jersey sales of a new style(colour) does help Hockey Canada.  Whatever colour they were, GO CANADA GO!  CHeers!
